entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Camrose
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Camrose 06:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -31.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -34.5°C
Wind: SE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
